name: HandTrackingEmojiShare
description:
Hand Tracking Emoji Share is an app let you creat a special moment then share. You can capture the moment and share it with your friends by using AR while viewing artworks and traveling.

How to Play

  • Raise you hand in front the camera, this app will catch nearest hand as target
  • Press  `Emoji` button to creat random emoji oject at your hand position
  • You can press `Add Tweet` button to snap photo then starting share you AR moment to twitter or other SNS
*** the download zip need password for private sourcecode
